subject: United States Open (Tennis)
Tennis
lead_paragraph: Serena, at 33, is just two victories from joining Maureen Connolly, Margaret Court and Steffi Graf as the only women to win all four major singles titles in the same season.
snippet: Serena, at 33, is just two victories from joining Maureen Connolly, Margaret Court and Steffi Graf as the only women to win all four major singles titles in the same season.
